title: Probability Calculator – Single Events, Combined Events & Binomial Distribution

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Formula used For X ~ Bin(n, p), the probability of exactly k successes is P(X = k) = C(n, k) · pk · (1 − p)n − k where C(n, k) is the binomial coefficient “n choose k”.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: P(A) = number of favourable outcomes / number of possible outcomes. Example: rolling a 4 on a fair die: P(4) = 1/6; rolling an even number: P({2,4,6}) = 3/6 = 1/2.

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).

Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
